DOC.brief_summary: S-1 newly develop novel oral dihydrouracil dehydrogenase inhibit fluoro-pyrimidine drug consist M tegafur ( FT ) , 0.4 M 5-chloro-2 , 4-dihydroxypyrimidine ( gimeracil ) , 1 M potassium oxonate ( oteracil ) , efficient antitumor activity low gastrointestinal toxicity . Several study prove safety efficacy single agent S-1 metastatic breast cancer . This study design investigate compare efficacy safety Epirubicin-cyclophosphamide-S-1 ( ECS ) vs. Epirubicin-cyclophosphamide-5-fluorouracil ( ECF ) neoadjuvant chemotherapy patient local advance breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant ECS Versus ECF Local Advanced Breast Cancer
